project_features: [utility script](./scripts/github-issues.ts) to retrieve all project remote github repository issues
[utility script](./scripts/gitmoji-setup.ts) to setup easily gitmoji in [commitzen](https://github.com/commitizen/cz-cli) and [commitlint](https://github.com/conventional-changelog/commitlint).
resources: [Advanced React Native Boilerplate using TypeScript, Eslint, Prettier, Husky, CommitLint & more](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z0hQK3eyK2M)
